House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00037
FULL TITLE : AN ACT ESTABLISHING A FREE IRRIGATION PROGRAM, REPEALING SECTION 2, PARAGRAPH (C) OF REPUBLIC ACT NO. 3601 OR "AN ACT CREATING THE NATIONAL IRRIGATION ADMINISTRATION"; SECTION 1, PARAGRAPH (B) OF PRESIDENTIAL DECREE NO. 552; SECTION 1, PARAGRAPH (B) PRESIDENTIAL DECREE NO. 1702; SECTION 35 OF REPUBLIC ACT NO. 8435, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE "AGRICULTURAL AND FISHERIES MODERNIZATION LAW"; AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
SHORT TITLE : Free Irrigation Law Of 2016
ABSTRACT : Creates a Free Irrigation Program (FIP) for the farmers in order to increase their incomes and uplift their living conditions, thereby effectively abolishing the Irrigation Service Fee (ISF) imposed on the farmers.
